nodes.text: The Aphelion III was a Galactic Republic ship in operation during the Third Galactic War. The ship was the most heavily-secured ship under the command of Vice Admiral Dol Narlock.

The Aphelion III was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught in an email from Dol Narlock. In the Republic storyline, Major Anri was captured on Mek-Sha and imprisoned on the brig of the ship, before escaping.
